title: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: When updating the checked state of the table, it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds in my case). A busy cursor should be shown during this process.
EB: I expect that when updating the checked state of the table, a busy cursor is displayed to indicate that the process is in progress.
SR: To reproduce the issue, update the checked state of the table and observe the lack of a busy cursor. The delay in updating the checked state should be approximately 30 seconds.
